mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.route_code AS "routeCode", a.route_name AS "routeName", a.start_area_id AS "startAreaId", a.start_area_code AS "startAreaCode", a.start_area_name AS "startAreaName", a.end_area_id AS "endAreaId", a.end_area_code AS "endAreaCode", a.end_area_name AS "endAreaName", a.mileage AS "mileage", a.timeliness AS "timeliness", a.data_set AS "dataSet", scds.name AS "dataSetName"
LEFT JOIN sys_common_data_set scds ON a.data_set = scds.code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_bms_route( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, rec_ver, remarks, route_code, route_name, start_area_id, start_area_code, start_area_name, end_area_id, end_area_code, end_area_name, mileage, timeliness, data_set ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{recVer}, #{remarks}, #{routeCode}, #{routeName}, #{startAreaId}, #{startAreaCode}, #{startAreaName}, #{endAreaId}, #{endAreaCode}, #{endAreaName}, #{mileage}, #{timeliness}, #{dataSet} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_bms_route SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, rec_ver = rec_ver + 1, route_code = #{routeCode}, route_name = #{routeName}, start_area_id = #{startAreaId}, start_area_code = #{startAreaCode}, start_area_name = #{startAreaName}, end_area_id = #{endAreaId}, end_area_code = #{endAreaCode}, end_area_name = #{endAreaName}, mileage = #{mileage}, timeliness = #{timeliness}, data_set = #{dataSet}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_bms_route a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} ${dataScope}
AND a.data_set = #{dataSet}
AND a.route_code LIKE '%'||#{routeCode}||'%' '%'+#{routeCode}+'%' concat('%',#{routeCode},'%')
AND a.route_name LIKE '%'||#{routeName}||'%' '%'+#{routeName}+'%' concat('%',#{routeName},'%')
AND a.start_area_code LIKE '%'||#{startAreaCode}||'%' '%'+#{startAreaCode}+'%' concat('%',#{startAreaCode},'%')
AND a.start_area_name LIKE '%'||#{startAreaName}||'%' '%'+#{startAreaName}+'%' concat('%',#{startAreaName},'%')
AND a.end_area_code LIKE '%'||#{endAreaCode}||'%' '%'+#{endAreaCode}+'%' concat('%',#{endAreaCode},'%')
AND a.end_area_name LIKE '%'||#{endAreaName}||'%' '%'+#{endAreaName}+'%' concat('%',#{endAreaName},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
